OES_draw_buffers_indexed.summary: The OES_draw_buffers_indexed extension is part of the WebGL API and enables the use of different blend options when writing to multiple color buffers simultaneously.

remarks.para: WebGL extensions are available using the method. For more information, see also Using Extensions in the WebGL tutorial.

blockquote.para: This extension is only available to {{domxref("WebGL2RenderingContext", "WebGL2", "", 1)}} contexts.

OES_draw_buffers_indexedBlendEquationiOE.summary: The blendEquationiOES() method of the OES_draw_buffers_indexed WebGL extension sets both the RGB blend and alpha blend equations for a particular draw buffer.

remarks.para: See for setting RGB and alpha separately and for the WebGL 1 version of this method.

OES_draw_buffers_indexedBlendEquationSep.summary: The blendEquationSeparateiOES() method of the WebGL extension sets the RGB and alpha blend equations separately for a particular draw buffer.

remarks.para: See for setting RGB and alpha together and for the WebGL 1 version of this method.

OES_draw_buffers_indexedBlendFunciOES.summary: The blendFunciOES() method of the WebGL extension defines which function is used when blending pixels for a particular draw buffer.

remarks.para: See for setting RGB and alpha components separately and for the WebGL 1 version of this method.

OES_draw_buffers_indexedBlendFuncSeparat.summary: The blendFuncSeparateiOES() method of the WebGL extension defines which function is used when blending pixels for RGB and alpha components separately for a particular draw buffer.

remarks.para: See for setting RGB and alpha together and for the WebGL 1 version of this method.

OES_draw_buffers_indexedColorMaskiOES.summary: The colorMaskiOES() method of the WebGL extension sets which color components to enable or to disable when drawing or rendering for a particular draw buffer. It's the indexed version of WebGL 1's method.

OES_draw_buffers_indexedDisableiOES.summary: The disableiOES() method of the WebGL extension enables blending for a particular draw buffer.

OES_draw_buffers_indexedEnableiOES.summary: The enableiOES() method of the WebGL extension enables blending for a particular draw buffer.
